my.example.code

Interface DataCenterInstances

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UniqueVersionsDataCenterInstances

    public interface DataCenterInstances
    Describes a set of behaviors used for storing data center capacity data and calculating the usable machine groups (M) the data describes. It is intended that each implementation of this interface provide a new strategy for how the data is stored and calculated in a performant way.

    Since:
    6/11/2013
    Author:
    David Williams (davidkwilliams@yahoo.com)

      • addInstance

        void addInstance(int machineGroupIndex,
               int dataSubsetIndex,
               int version)

        Adds for management a data subset machine instance with the given version.

        Parameters:
        machineGroupIndex - the machine group index (0 based) for this data subset machine instance
        dataSubsetIndex - the data subset index (0 based) for this data subset machine instance
        version - the version for this data subset

      • calculateTotalUsableMachineGroups

        int calculateTotalUsableMachineGroups()

        Calculates the number of machine groups containing a set of matching data subset versions using the managed data. These represent a complete set of data subsets which together can server 100 requests per second.

        Returns:
        the number of machine groups containing a set of matching data subset versions
